summary:
This is an script extender plugin that makes windowed mode fullscreen and borderless. Make sure to set your resolution to your desktop resolution in order for the window to fit nicely.

Games Supported:
-Fallout 3
-Fallout: New Vegas
-Oblivion
-Skyrim

Installation Instruction:
-Extract FullScre
descriptionHtml:
This is an script extender plugin that makes windowed mode fullscreen and borderless. Make sure to set your resolution to your desktop resolution in order for the window to fit nicely.

Update Notes:
Version 3:
- Added code to try to ensure that when you alt+tab you have a visible mouse cursor.
- Added support for nexus mod manager

Version 2:
- Added code to support more games

Version 1:
- Initial Release

Games Supported:
-Fallout 3
-Fallout: New Vegas
-Oblivion
-Skyrim

Installation Instruction:
-Extract FullScreenWindowedMode to your script extender directory.
    -data\FOSE\Plugins\
    -data\NVSE\Plugins\
    -data\OBSE\Plugins\
    -data\SKSE\Plugins\
author: timthompson89
